mapper.sql: id, bill_no, bill_type, biz_type, ref_bill_no, ref_bill_type, original_bill_no, status, buyer_no, buyer_name, saler_no, saler_name, send_date, receive_date, send_store_no, send_store_name, receive_store_no, receive_store_name, sku_id, sku_no, supplier_no, supplier_name, item_no, item_code, item_name, brand_no, brand_name, category_no, category_name, cost, bill_cost, tax_rate, exclusive_cost, send_qty, receive_qty, order_no, balance_no, balance_type, balance_status, is_split, path_no, order_unit_no, order_unit_name, organ_no, organ_name, order_unit_no_from, order_unit_name_from, organ_no_from, organ_name_from, zone_no, zone_name, zone_no_from, zone_name_from, is_bill_invoice, invoice_apply_no, invoice_apply_date,create_user,create_time

B.bill_no, B.bill_type, B.biz_type, B.create_user, B.send_date, B.receive_date, B.status, B.zone_no_from, B.zone_name_from, B.saler_no, B.saler_name, B.order_unit_no_from, B.order_unit_name_from, B.organ_no_from, B.organ_name_from, B.send_store_no, B.send_store_name, B.zone_no, B.zone_name, B.buyer_no, B.buyer_name, B.order_unit_no, B.order_unit_name, B.organ_no, B.organ_name, B.receive_store_no, B.receive_store_name, B.item_no, B.item_code, B.item_name, B.brand_no, B.brand_name, (SELECT brand_unit.`name` FROM brand_unit, brand WHERE brand.`sys_no` = brand_unit.`code` AND brand.`brand_no` = B.`brand_no`) brand_unit_name, B.category_no, B.category_name, B.cost, B.bill_cost, B.send_qty, B.receive_qty, C1.category_no one_level_category_no, C1.name one_level_category_name, C2.category_no two_level_category_no, C2.name two_level_category_name, (B.send_qty * B.cost) send_amount, (B.receive_qty * B.cost) receive_amount, B.is_split
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) as s FROM bill_sale_balance B LEFT JOIN category C1 ON LEFT(B.`category_no`, 2) = C1.`category_no` LEFT JOIN category C2 ON LEFT(B.`category_no`, 4) = C2.`category_no` WHERE 1 = 1 AND ( B.bill_type = 2006 AND B.biz_type = '36' )

SELECT ,B.balance_no FROM bill_sale_balance B LEFT JOIN category C1 ON LEFT(B.`category_no`, 2) = C1.`category_no` LEFT JOIN category C2 ON LEFT(B.`category_no`, 4) = C2.`category_no` WHERE 1 = 1 AND ( B.bill_type = 2006 AND B.biz_type = '36' )
GROUP BY #{params.groupBy}

SELECT '合计' SALER_NAME, IFNULL(SUM(B.send_qty), 0) send_qty, IFNULL(SUM(B.send_qty * B.cost), 0) send_amount FROM bill_buy_balance B LEFT JOIN bill_sale_balance B1 ON B.bill_no = B1.bill_no AND B.item_no = B1.item_no WHERE 1 = 1 AND ( B.bill_type = 2006 AND B.biz_type = '36' )

SELECT COUNT(1) as s FROM bill_buy_balance B LEFT JOIN category C1 ON LEFT(B.`category_no`, 2) = C1.`category_no` LEFT JOIN category C2 ON LEFT(B.`category_no`, 4) = C2.`category_no` LEFT JOIN bill_sale_balance B1 ON B.bill_no = B1.bill_no AND B.item_no = B1.item_no WHERE 1 = 1 AND B.bill_type in('1361','2006') AND B.biz_type in ('25','35')

SELECT '合计' SALER_NAME, IFNULL(SUM(B.send_qty), 0) send_qty, IFNULL(SUM(B.receive_qty), 0) receive_qty, IFNULL(SUM(B.send_qty * B.cost), 0) send_amount, IFNULL(SUM(B.receive_qty * B.cost), 0) receive_amount FROM bill_buy_balance B LEFT JOIN bill_sale_balance B1 ON B.bill_no = B1.bill_no AND B.item_no = B1.item_no WHERE 1 = 1 AND ( B.bill_type = 2006 AND B.biz_type = '36' )
